concept.title: Base Starter
concept.shortdesc: The Base Starter is a program that runs when the system starts.

conbody.p: The program completes the initialization of the File Server, then starts the System Starter process. You must customize the Base Starter when you create a port of Symbian platform to a phone. To customize the Base Starter, you change the configuration files and the Base Starter source code.
The Base Starter has often also been called EStart.
